projects.title: Polyphonic Real-Time Harmonizer
projects.description: A virtual instrument designed for live performance which retunes an input vocal signal to various output signals determined from midi input.

projects.title: Rachel Kobernick Portfolio
projects.description: Editable portfolio website for career Opera singer. Responsive and elegant web design that works at all screen sizes.

projects.title: Hitch
projects.description: A cross-platform mobile application designed for college students coordinating carpooling trips as an alternative to expensive existing forms of long-distance travel. Created using Google's Flutter.

projects.title: Repertoire Vault
projects.description: Online tool designed for career musicians to track and share their performance ready repertoire
